nodes.text: The Red Dwarf Raiders were a criminal group based on the planet Burnin Konn during the Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector by the Galactic Empire. When the Trade Spine League starship Space Manta was shot down by the blockade, it crash landed in the group's territory on Burnin Konn.

The crime lord "Happy" Dapp then sent a young smuggler to retrieve cargo from the vessel. Human members of the Red Dwarf Raiders armed with swords or blaster pistols attacked the smuggler, but were all defeated, allowing their foe to retrieve the cargo for Dapp.
The Red Dwarf Raiders first appeared in the 2015 mobile game Star Wars: Uprising.
